resources.string: "This is a meticulously designed 3 bhk resale apartment located in prabhadevi dadar (West) dadar, mumbai south. It is a freehold property. The flat is a spacious property and is under construction. Possession of the property is expected by 2021. Located in an integrated society of sona asteria heights, it has 3 bathroom(s). It is located on the 17th floor. Full power back up. The unit is located in a gated society. The property offers specifications such as club house/community center, fitness centre/gym, intercom facility, lift(s), park and rain water harvestin. The apartment is approximately priced at rs. 5. 5 cr and its per sq. Meter cost is rs. 448066. 1 covered parking is also available."
